(ROOT
  (SQ (MD Can)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VB summarize)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN meaning))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NN life))))
      (PP (IN into)
        (NP (CD one) (JJ simple) (NN sentence))))
    (. ?)))

root(ROOT-0, summarize-3)

dobj(summarize-3, meaning-5)
prep(meaning-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, life-7)
prep(summarize-3, into-8)
num(sentence-11, one-9)
amod(sentence-11, simple-10)
pobj(into-8, sentence-11)

    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))

      (, ,))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN answer))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ ultimate) (NN question))
          (PP (IN as) (TO to)
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB why))
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP (VBP exist))))))))
    (VP (VBP lie)
      (PP (IN in)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP what))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBN known)
                (PP (IN as)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Unified) (NNP Field) (NNP Theory)))))))))
    (. .)))

                (NP (DT the) (NNP Big) (NNP Bang))
                (VP (VBD occurred)))))
          (CC and)
          (VP (VB come)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (DT an) (NN equation)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB represent)
                      (NP (PRP it)))))))
            (, ,)))))))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN meaning))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (NN life))
          ('' '')
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VBD re-word)
                (NP (DT the) (NN question))

                      (NP (DT The) (NN meaning))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN life)))
                      ('' ''))

                      (NP (DT the) (NN answer)))))))))))
    (VP (VBZ becomes)
      (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ practical)
        (CC and)
        (JJ relevant)))
    (. .)))

        (NN life)))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG (IN if)
    (SBAR
      (ADVP (RB not)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (NN fact))))
      (IN that)
      (S
        (NP (PRP they))
        (VP (VBD had)
          (ADVP (RB really))
          (VP (VBN seen)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Resurrected) (NNP Jesus))))))
    (. ?)))

det(questions-5, any-4)
dobj(have-3, questions-5)
prep(questions-5, about-6)
pobj(about-6, Jesus-7)
cc(Jesus-7, and-8)
det(meaning-10, the-9)
conj(Jesus-7, meaning-10)
prep(meaning-10, of-11)
pobj(of-11, Easter-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB please))
    (VP (VB do)
      (VP (VB write)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (PRP me)))
        (PP (IN at))))
    (. .)))


discourse(write-3, please-1)
aux(write-3, do-2)
root(ROOT-0, write-3)
prep(write-3, to-4)
pobj(to-4, me-5)
prep(write-3, at-6)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (ADVP (RB still))
        (VP (VBG wondering)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP what))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do)
                  (PP (IN on)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN morning))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Friday))))
                    (, ,)))))))))))


mark(wondering-5, If-1)
nsubj(wondering-5, you-2)
aux(wondering-5, are-3)
advmod(wondering-5, still-4)
root(ROOT-0, wondering-5)
nsubj(do-8, what-6)
aux(do-8, to-7)
ccomp(wondering-5, do-8)
prep(do-8, on-9)
det(morning-11, the-10)
pobj(on-9, morning-11)
prep(morning-11, of-12)
nn(Friday-14, Good-13)
pobj(of-12, Friday-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB do)
      (VP (VB join)
        (NP (PRP us))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Chinese) (NNP Swimming) (NNP Club))
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (CD 10am)))))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Easter) (NN gathering))
            (VP (VBN followed)
              (PP (IN by)
                (NP (DT a) (NN buffet) (NN Lunch))))))))
    (. .)))


aux(join-2, do-1)
root(ROOT-0, join-2)
dobj(join-2, us-3)
prep(join-2, at-4)
nn(Club-7, Chinese-5)
nn(Club-7, Swimming-6)
pobj(at-4, Club-7)
prep(Club-7, at-8)
pobj(at-8, 10am-9)
prep(join-2, for-10)
poss(gathering-13, our-11)
nn(gathering-13, Easter-12)
pobj(for-10, gathering-13)
partmod(gathering-13, followed-14)
prep(followed-14, by-15)
det(Lunch-18, a-16)
nn(Lunch-18, buffet-17)
pobj(by-15, Lunch-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT All))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB tell)
            (NP (DT the) (NN Security))
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBG coming)
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (DT the) (NNP TGIF) (NN event)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-6, All-1)
nsubj(have-3, you-2)
rcmod(All-1, have-3)
aux(do-5, to-4)
xcomp(have-3, do-5)
root(ROOT-0, is-6)
aux(tell-8, to-7)
xcomp(is-6, tell-8)
det(Security-10, the-9)
dobj(tell-8, Security-10)
mark(coming-14, that-11)
nsubj(coming-14, you-12)
aux(coming-14, are-13)
ccomp(tell-8, coming-14)
prep(coming-14, for-15)
det(event-18, the-16)
nn(event-18, TGIF-17)
pobj(for-15, event-18)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP May)))


root(ROOT-0, May-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP take)
      (S
        (NP (DT this) (NN opportunity))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB wish)
            (S
              (NP (DT all) (NNS Christians))
              (NP (DT a) (JJ very) (NNP Blessed) (NNP Easter)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(take-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, take-2)
det(opportunity-4, this-3)
nsubj(wish-6, opportunity-4)
aux(wish-6, to-5)
xcomp(take-2, wish-6)
det(Christians-8, all-7)
nsubj(Easter-12, Christians-8)
det(Easter-12, a-9)
amod(Easter-12, very-10)
nn(Easter-12, Blessed-11)
xcomp(wish-6, Easter-12)
